1.content:
"What a terrible mistake I done" you thought for yourself once you sow the seeds.

You were a poor peasant that had just changed your cow for some so-called magical beans. But as soon as you sow them, you saw that nothing happened. "They told me these seeds will grow in an instant." you said angrily.

"What a waste" you thought.

You then went to sleep. During the night, the under the moon ray the seeds began to grow until it become a giant beanstalk. In the morning, when you looked out the window you got shocked when you saw the giant beanstalk. You exited out the house and you thought "I know I will regret this; but I will climb this beanstalk" you thought.

You climbed the giant beanstalk with relative ease. By the time you reached it, you saw a big giant castle.

"I don't think it is a good idea to enter someones home but... what could possibly happen?" you thought.

You ran to the door of the giant castle. You knocked the door with your foot. "Maybe this way someone will hear me." You were right as you felt that the ground shook, making you fell on your back.

The door opened and the happy tree friend character that saw you and received you was...
1.title: The castle in the sky

13.content:
"Who's... who's there?" you heard a female voice sounding nervous coming from the door. Then in front of you, appeared a giant red female porcupine with a lot of dandruff on her quills. She saw everywhere, trying to find someone.

"I... I am down here" you shouted.

Then the red porcupine looked down at you and she began to scream so loud; that you almost became deaf. You could her screaming "It is a chicken!!! Go away, go!!!" You then understand the situation and you shouted to her you were not a chicken. She did not heard you at first. You shouted again and this time she calmed enough to stop screaming. Then she picked you and examined you better.

"You... you are not a chicken, right?" she asked a bit nervously.

"No. I am just a villager below the clouds." you said.

She sighed a little, and she took you inside. You saw a lot of luxury furniture and plants in every corner. The place was pretty clean.. and silent, like a pacific garden.

The giant porcupine sat in a coach and continued examining you. She said "My name is Flaky. You know, You are not the first to come here"

"Is that so? But first, are you afraid of chickens?" you asked.

"Well.. that is a long story. And about the other people, I suggest you not to ask much questions about it"

There was a large moment of silence. Flaky was still seeing you with a strange look that made you uncomfortable.

You break the silence asking "Do I have something wrong?"

"Why you ask?" replied Flaky.

"Because you keep seeing me with those eyes for a long time" you said.

"It is because you are different from the others. You are more... interesting than the others" said Flaky with a happy face.

She put you in a table and said: "Wait me here, I will bring you something special" and she went through a door and looked at you thinking "What a sweet thing"

You were a bit perplexed about the porcupine's behavior. Before you could think anything about it, you heard a noise in the ceiling. You thought you should investigate it... but you thought it wasn't a good idea to upset the porcupine. You can also wait for her and ask her about why you are more interesting from the others.

What to do?
13.title: Reconforting talk... or maybe bizarre

choices: You Decide to Do As She Says
131.content:
You waited politely, sitting cross-legged on the wooden table, listening to the giant porcupine's large footsteps slowly begin to fade. You turned to your left and noticed a bowl...with a sliver of milk drizzling down the size, making a small puddle of white by the bowl's edge. "Hmm... cereal?" you inquire. You look around more at your surroundings, marveling at the bright, brick-walled room. It was almost like a dream. You were awoken from your trail of thought by the soft thuds of Flaky's footsteps, which turned to thunder, as she approached the table you were on, clenching a fistful of...what appeared to be a leg or two and an arm sticking out from between the matted paw that held it. "Tee hee," she giggled, noticing your curiosity, which she thought was "cute." She revealed the specimen, or specimens, in her paw, which turned out that to be three wriggling, writhing villagers. None of them looked familiar to you, though. "That's what I meant when I said 'others,' little one." Flaky said softly.

"Wait, what are you trying to say?" you look up at Flaky nervously, noticing a gleaming smile from her red, exubrant face. The quills on her back seemed to stick up in suspense from this question, as she answered, "Well, you're not the only one who's visited my castle high above in the clouds before. Many people, all from whom have managed to reach here different ways, have succeeded as well. Yep, I think I've had about ten in my life's pastime...but now, of course, with you here, that can be arranged to eleven, now." "Ten? What happened to the other seven? You're holding three..." you gulp, feeling a tightness in your throat. "Well... I was kinda hungry, admittedly..." Flaky said, blushing, turning even redder than her skin pigment already was. You felt a deep sickness in your stomach. "You ATE them?? How could you!" "Now now, little guy, I only eat the ones that disobey my orders. These three have been loyal and haven't tried to escape, though... They service me well, occasionally tending to my chores, watering my plants, easy stuff." You look at the three men, all of which trembling in Flaky's hand, probably frightened by how loud her voice was, even though she was speaking in a steady tone, but they were tiny and all. "So you're going to make me YOUR slave too now, right?" you say, taking a few steps back.

Flaky smiles warmly, "Well...you're really just so small, and...cuter than the others. I think I'll just have you do ONE task for me. But if you disagree..." Flaky, using her other hand's paw finger to pinch one of the little man's shirt by the collar, hoisted him up high above her head, him screaming and flailing his arms, both from the shock of being lifted up so high and fast, and from knowing what would probably come next...and he was right. As you looked on with horror, Flaky's enormous, bucked-tooth jaws slowly opened, revealing her huge, glossy, sticky maw. Saliva clinging to the roof of her mouth, tongue bulging like a pink blob beneath the ringed cavern, a set of white teeth each hidden within the wet-ridden mouth, and a eeriee darkness at the back of the reddish room, where the tongue connects with the throat, uvula hanging above, rising and lowering with each deep breath Flaky inhaled, then exhaled, blowing gusts of hot air into the tiny human's face, with the smell of what may have been Flaky's last meal. You and the other two men, still standing on Flaky's paw, could watch and do nothing as Flaky lowered the shrieking being, tears flowing down his face, which was red from both the heat exhausting from Flaky's maw and the shock of all this happening so fast. Flaky closed her eyes to enjoy the situation better as she quickly threw the man onto the squishy, wet tongue, in which an audible squelch was heard from the outside, and instantly, Flaky's lips snapped shut, trapping her prisoner tight in the hot, salivating, alive cave. She took a moment or two to get a taste of the man, her cheeks flexing, using her tongue to sway him by flipping him around side-to-side, like a washing machine, covering him in her saliva, filling her taste buds with a multitude of different flavors. Then, finally, she tilted her head back a bit, and you saw saw a small lump begin to grow at the top of Flaky's throat, just under the chin. You and the others head a loud, sickening gulp, and watched as the lump expand exuberantly, and travel down, in vain, down down her lustrous throat, where it shrunk and then disappeared, once reaching the belly, in which, you could see her stomach expand ever so slightly with the tiny man's body taking up space from being dumped in. She opened her eyes and sighed deeply... She placed a paw on her tummy, smiling. "Ahh... such a tasty meal." she giggled, looking at your face. "So, will you be a good boy and do as I ask? Or will you have to become the next part of the meal" she said, patting her red belly playfully. You looked up at the huge porcupine, then back at the two remaining men, crouching down in fear. You thought for a moment...
131.title: The Truth

choices: Get in my mouth and clean my teeth
1311.content: "OK, what do you want me to do?" You give in to Flaky's demands, and she smiles. "Good boy. Your first task is to..."
1311.title: You Decide to Do As She Says

1312.content:
"What the hell I am still doing here?" you thought for yourself.

"So then little guy... what is your answer?" asked Flaky, waiting for your answer.

"Look you really put quite a good point and you a nice porcupine... but..." you began to say as you quickly climbed down the table and then began to run.

Flaky sighed and then said... "Oh... it is a real shame that the little guy had to choose to run... I really wanted to have him as my personal slave... Oh well... it can't be help" then she put the two other men in a jar and then continued to chase you. You continued running now seeing you were now inside the kitchen. Then you hide below the table.

"Well... this is very appropiate... you hide right in the perfect place so I casn have another meal!" said Flaky. Then she began to crouch in order to find you. "Peek-a-boo where are you?" You breathe heavily knowing what would happen if she found you so you decided to remain hidden until you found an opening to excape. But...

"Peek-a-bee... you will be my next meal!" said Flaky finding you and trying to catch you... you managed to avoid her paw making her to hit with the table and a jar that was above the table fall on her head, somewhat stunning her. Then you tried to hide inside one of the counters that had an open door. After recovering a little... you notice a small crack in the wall and thought that it might be your way out...
1312.title: Attempt to escape

choices: Stay where you are, and trust that he won't hurt you.
Try and talk to him and calm him down.
151.content:
An enormous light green bear wearing dog tags and a green beret answered the door.
He looked down at you curiously.
In the far distance, you heard a low thunder rumble and it began to rain.

"Well...we better get you inside, little person." said the bear.

Quickly, he cupped you gently in his paws and brought you into his castle.
After being outside in the cold, it was very comforting to be inside the warm castle,
especially inside the bear's warm paws.
You wondered if you should be more worried though.
Was this bear friend or foe?

He opened his paws and set you down gently on a sofa.
When he sat down beside you, it knocked you off balance and you tumbled head over heels
right into his thigh.
You looked up frightened, but he only looked down at you gently.

"There there, little guy. I won't hurt you. My name is Flippy. You're lucky I found you out there
before it started to rain. That could have ended badly for you."

"Wow...thanks Flippy." You beamed up at him. He does seem to be pretty nice after all.
Flippy got to his feet and started for a distant doorway that you could only guess led to the kitchen.

"Would you like something to eat friend? I could ma..."

Suddenly, a loud thunder crack shook the castle.
The power went out and everything went dark.

You couldn't see Flippy now. It was pitch black.
But you could hear him though. He was muttering crazily to himself.
"N..no...not again...I...I can't..war...soldiers...my...friends...death...KILL!!! ARRRRGE!"

He screamed so loud that it hurt your ears.
You could have sworn that you just heard a knife being unshethed in the dark.

"Heh heh heheheheHAhaAHAhaha...must...kill...must...kill..."
You heard Flippy walking slowly toward you.
His footsteps sounded odd, like he was limping.

What do you do?
151.title: Flippy

1511.content:
Something was terribly wrong with Flippy, you could tell.
And you weren't going to stick around to find out.

Before he got any closer, you quickly ran to the edge of the sofa and lowered
yourself down slowly to the stone floor.
High above, you could hear the deranged Flippy searching for you in the dark.

As your eyes became used to the gloom, you could barely make out
shapes around you, including Flippy's gargantuan body towering a high above you,
a mad gleam in his eyes.

"Where aaaaare you, little guy...I won't hurt you...HAHAHA!!!"
Yeah, you could really believe that.

He still had not seen where you went, so you dashed off to find some hiding spot
before the lights came back on.

Around the edge of the room, you spotted a mouse hole in the wall.
A very dim light, like from a candle, came from the hole.
Its the only place that you could hide from Flippy at the
moment, so you made a dash for it.

No sooner did you get inside, when the power in the castle returned.
You peeked out the hole at Flippy, who is tearing the room apart
trying to find you.

The voice of a creature, your size, came from behind you in the back of the hole.
"Hey! What are you doing here? This is my hiding place..."

You turned around and saw...
1511.title: RUN!!!

1512.content:
You looked into the gloomy dark room, as Flippy's footsteps drew closer.
"HAHHeheHEehEeHE...you ...don't know what its like...bombs going off all around you...
YaHaHAHeee....bullets whizzing past your head...burying themselves into the brains of your friends...
YAAAAH!!!"

You leaped to the side as Flippy plunged a building sized buie knife into the sofa, inches from where you had just stood.
You could hear the fabric of the sofa rip as Flippy cackled insanely.

"You know...i've seen things...things that would drive ANYONE INSANE!
I had to hide...inside the body of a dead friend, just so I could STAY ALIVE!
Well...you could say it..HAHEheheEHehe...changed me...a little..."

You could feel the knife being yanked from the sofa.
Since he couldn't see you, Flippy reached down and felt around,
trying to find you.

Terrifed at what you had gotten yourself into, you inched backwards,
away from his groping hand. He was off his rocker!

You kept inching backwards until you hit the end of the sofa.
That was it...you were trapped.
You couldn't go further back,
and you couldn't go forward into the hands of the deranged bear.

Luckily, you didn't have to make that decision.
You should have run when you had the chance.
Before Flippy...flipped out.

His groping hand came upon you by luck and snatched you into the air.
"So THEEEERE you are! THAT Wasn'T VERy NiCe, ruNnInG from Uncle FliPpY! YOU NEED TO BE TAUGHT A LESSON!"

With a sickening snap, he ripped one of you arms off like a toothpick.
You screamed in agony, your blood running down his hand.

"MMmmmmMMmm...yum...yum...YUMMY!"
You still couldn't see, but you heard him smacking his lips as he devoured your severed arm.

"NoW! YOU LEARN...ITS TIME FOR YOU TO DIIIE!! DIE!!"

With that he crunched you up in his fingers as tight as he could,
breaking your tiny fragile body into powder.

One thing that you should know.
After Flippy came out of his manic episode,
he cried over your mangled body.

He hated it when that happened...
And it always happened...sooner or later.
1512.title: Baaaad choice.

choices: Continued working as a good worker
You talked to one Happy Tree Friend
152.content:
A big shadow towered you. You looked up and saw the biggest beaver you had ever seen in your life. He was using a tool-belt and a builder helmet. His fur was completely orange. He was looking you with a smirk.

"When this interruptions will end? Well, the only good thing is that I have more that will help me with my... project" said as he tried to grab you. Just then, you noticed that he did not have any hands and he has them bandaged.

For a moment you felt sorry about him when you saw his tired expression when trying to grab you.

"Ehm... Mr. Beaver?" you asked timidly.

"What?" he said with an angry expression.

"What about... if I come myself inside?" you said.

"That will be nice of your part" said with a happy expression.

You entered the castle and you saw it was a bit... empty. "Remodeling my castle" said the beaver.

"So... that is why you need me, right?" you asked

"Not exactly. I hope if you don't mind... yo help me to build... something" he asked.

"No. Of course not. I was very good at building houses" you said.

"That would be great, but in this case I want you to help me in to build something in my garden."

"And that would be..."

"A dam. To give my castle that little touch of the old home, if you understand"

"Yes." you said sarcastically.

You both reached the garden and you saw other animals working in the dam. "They are other... people that came to visit my castles. You can start working here cutting the trees, by the way, I recommend you to stay away from the others. They can... be a little exaggerate about what they said. I will be back soon to see your work. Do not cause an accident"

"Thanks, Mr. Beaver." you said.

"Jejeje. You can call me, Handy" ha said as he went inside the castle

"OK. Handy" you said as you picked up an axe and began to cut a tree. Then you saw the other animals and you thought if it was a true what Hand said,m because you saw some sad expressions on them.

You...
152.title: New worker... or slave?

154.content:
When the door opened you saw a a giant pink chipmunk with a red bow in her head. You blushed a little because you considered her... a giant beauty. She saw you and picked you up. She seemed to be happy when she saw you, as she took you inside quickly.

She chuckled a little and said "I am Giggles. It is good that another little cutie comes to visit me" she said.

"Are there others?" you asked.

"Yes. Right now we were taking the tea."

When you arrived, you saw other animals dressed elegant. There was a purple beaver, a yellow rabbit and a blue moose. Giggles put you down next to a table and said: "Wait me here. I will go for the tea" and she went to the kitchen.

"Hi. How are you? And who are you?" you asked friendly.

"I am Toothy and we are going to escape." said the beaver.

"Why?"

"I am Cuddles and it is because her cooking is the worst." said the rabbit.

"I am Lumpy and I rather prefer to eat mud than her food" said the moose.

"It is so bad?" you asked.

"You will taste it soon" said Toothy.

Giggles returned with a teacup full and served you in little cups. Then she went again saying something about bringing you new clothes. You taste the tea and as soon as you tasted it you threw it back.

"My God!!!!! Is this a drink?! It tastes like..." you said spiting.

"Yes we know. Now we have to escape"

You thought for a second about the situation and you thought it would be better to say something to the chipmunk. But also you thought it was a better idea trying to escape than to taste another horrible thing...

So you...
154.title: Taking the tea... as a doll.

1551.content: Two giant green raccoons, Lifty and Shifty stepped out of the door with their trademark grins. You are shocked and said, "Oh my god!" "Hey, you." said Shifty, "Who are ya and what are you doing in our castle." You where quivering in fear trying to speak. Then, you fainted. "What's with him?" said Lifty. "Dunno, but I think he looks delicious." said Shifty. "Let's invite him in." "Alright," said Lifty. Shitfy grabbed you and placed you into their castle. "What should we do with him?" said Shifty. "Let's put him in the jar with the others, then we can eat him." said Lifty. He puts you into the jar, closed it with the lid and put it with a cupboard and left the room. Suddenly, you woke up and said, "What the? I'm trapped in a jar?" Then, you saw 6 trapped HTFs, Toothy, Handy, Nutty, Flaky, Sniffles and Mime. "They must have captured the others." you thought, "What should I do?"
1551.title: Oh, boy!

15511.content:
"... All right... what are we going to do now?" asked Toothy.

"Now we have one more person we can now reach the top of this jar andpossibly try to open it... or we can simply push it with the newbie's help" said Sniffles.

"I don't want to be in a jar that is for sure..." you said. Then the six Happy tree friends and you began to push the jar with all your strength and making it move to the border,excpet for Handy who simply gave its glare while notcing he couldn't push. Then they managed to give one strong last push that made the jar to fall to the ground and then break in the ground.

"What was that?" asked Shifty as he and his brother quickly headed to the room.

"Talking about a rough landing..." you said. But now you need to choose with path you take to escape..,. either by using the door or the window... Choice is yours.
15511.title: Helping to escape

1552.content:
The door slowly opened. A giant pale-blue flying squirrel wearing eyeglasses, a necktie and a fedora, came out. He was happy when he saw you.

"Finally..." he said as he picked you up. "... someone came to tell me about the current events" and he entered his castle.

Inside it was decorated more like a department rather than a castle. It has some kind of radio, an oven and a big blue couch. The giant squirrel put you in a table next to a typewriter.

"What do you mean with "current" events?" you asked.

"You see, I am a reporter. My name is Spl... it is Larry. (sorry for the bad choice if name). I am suppose to be writing about the important events that happen under this castle."

"So then, you ask the strangers that come here?"

"Basically, yes."

"Then, how many people has come already?" you asked.

"Counting you? About 4" said Larry.

"Where are they?" you asked.

"They "suffered" an accident for getting on thing that was not of their business." said in a serious tone.

"OK, I understand. Sorry to tell you but..." you were interrupted by the radio which transmitted the sound of a voice calling for help.

"What is that?"

"It is... nothing. If you excuse me I have to leave. I'll be back soon." said as he entered a room.

"Where are...?" you stopped as you the squirrel's angry expression. He closed the door and you heard a crashing in the room. Next you saw was a blue light disappearing in the sight.

"What was...?" you noticed the door opened. You could peek a little. But you then thought that if you did that "Larry" would be angry... unless you did that quickly.
1552.title: Not so common squirrel

1553.content:
Another war happy tree friend.

(There is not much information about him. So, let's say he has also a post-traumatic stress disorder based on explosions)
1553.title: Others

info.brief_description: A episode from HTF... using another giant/giantess
info.description:
Happy Tree Friends belongs to Mondo Media along with the episode. Hope they will make more great episodes.

You are a random human, morphed in the happy tree friends cartoon. You exchanged your cow with some kind of magical beans, which grow into a giant beanstalk that grows to the sky. You found yourself a giant castle... with a giant Happy tree friend

What will he/she will do to you?

Here are the rules:

-I really don't don't want any sex in this story but if your chapter is really good I may not erase it.
-I will only allow oral vore... and maybe another of the gruesome typical deaths of the show.
-By the way, you can't add Lumpy as the giant since he already had that privilege.
-In the castle, there are other shrunk happy tree friends... or you can be alone. The choice is yours.
-Since Ka-pow! is part of HTF you can add characters from it.
-I forgot to mention. Characters can speak and talk this time.
-Add please
info.pretty_title: Dunce Upon a Time Other version HTF
